EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to respond to customer to clarify options for defective parts (replacement accepted/ or not)
EmailTemplate.name: RMA Defective SPEX Unit
EmailTemplate.subject: RMA Response for Defective SPEX Unit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: <Enter Customer CASE#>
SO XXXXXX, PO XXXXXX, PN XXXXXX, SN XXXXXX, Qty XXXXXX, Invoice XXXXXX.
We would need you to send us a new Purchase Order if you are going to accept the replacement for the defective unit. Please send your request to spex-bgaorders@honeywell.com so your replacement order can be processed by SPEX team.
If you do not need a replacement and you would like to return the unit back to Honeywell, please find attached the Core return tag for your reference. The unit must be sent back to the address mentioned in the core return tag.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
